To add an allergen disclaimer to your terms of service, you can add the following clause:

"Allergen Disclaimer: Our products may contain ingredients that are known to cause allergies or intolerances, including gluten, sesame seeds, eggs, and other potential allergens. We take reasonable precautions to avoid cross-contamination, but we cannot guarantee the absence of allergens in our products. Customers with allergies or intolerances are responsible for checking the ingredient labels and assessing the suitability of our products for their individual needs."

Additionally, you may want to include the following clause to limit your liability for allergic reactions:

"Limitation of Liability for Allergic Reactions: Challah By The Bay is not liable for any damages or injuries that may arise from allergic reactions to our products. Customers with allergies or intolerances are responsible for checking the ingredient labels and assessing the suitability of our products for their individual needs."

Please note that the exact wording and content of your terms of service may depend on the specific laws and regulations in California, and you may want to consult with a legal professional to ensure that your terms comply with applicable laws and regulations.
